title: Technology-Enhanced Social Studies Classroom Restructuring: Modeling and Multimedia Integration Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone proficiency and foundational concepts in elementary social studies
context.additional_context: Targets pre-service and social studies teachers, focusing on curriculum redesign in limited-technology environments primarily using smartphones

learning_goals: Acquisition of multimedia authoring tool skills to effectively deliver social studies content.
Cultivation of the ability to design simulation-based science lessons using modeling software.
Evaluation of the ability to apply inquiry-based instructional methods suitable for technology-integrated classes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
